Description: Fragment of papyrus, with remains of Coptic text written on one side: a column of 12 lines to right and a column of 13 lines at right angles to the left; both with magical signs. On the recto is a crude drawing of a man and a single line of text. Mounted together with EA 75438.
Curator's comments: Under study with a view to publication by Michael Zellmann-Rohrer [July 2016].
